contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Given Name Revised | name = Hana | image= | imagesize= | caption= | pronunciation= | gender = female and male | meaning = the Grace of God (Jewish), happiness (Arabic), flower (Persian, Japanese), nose (Japanese) | region = | origin = | related names = [[Hannah (given name)|Hannah]] | footnotes = | wikt = {{wiktionary|Hana|hana}} }} '''Hana''' as a [[given name]] may have several origins. It is a variant transliteration of [[Hannah (given name)|Hannah]], which is the Jewish and Christian form, meaning Grace in [[Hebrew]] associated with God, as well as an Arabic name meaning ''happiness'' (هَنا), a Persian name meaning a type of flower (حَنا), and a Kurdish name. As a Japanese name it means ''flower'' (花, 華) or ''nose'' (鼻). In Korean, it means the number ''one'' (하나). "Hana" in Albanian language it means "moon" & also "e Hane" is Monday first day of the week. {{tocright}} ==People== *[[Hana Černá]] (born 1974), Czech freestyle and medley swimmer *[[Hana Mandlíková]] (born 1962), Czech professional tennis player *[[Hana Soukupová]] (born 1985), Czech supermodel *[[Hana Mae Lee]], actress known for her role as Lilly in [[Pitch Perfect]] *[[Jung Hana]] (born 1990), South Korean idol and member of [[Secret (South Korean band)|Secret]] ==Characters== *[[Hana Asakura]], the son of Anna Kyoyama and Yoh Asakura in ''Funbari no Uta'' *[[Hana Gitelman]], a character on the television series ''Heroes'' *[[Hana Inuzuka]], the elder sister of the character Kiba Inuzuka in the ''Naruto'' manga *[[Hana Makihatayama]], (Hana-chan) a character in the anime ''Ojamajo Doremi'' *[[Hana Stoppable]], Ron's adopted baby sister on the Disney Channel animated series ''Kim Possible'' *[[Hana Yamaguchi]], a character in ''Guru Guru Pon-chan'' *[[Hanatarou Yamada]], a character in the ''Bleach'' manga *[[Saki Hanajima]] (Hana-chan), a character in the manga and anime ''Fruits Basket'' *Hana, a character in the manga and anime series ''[[Peacemaker Kurogane]]'' *Hana, a nurse in the novel and film ''[[The English Patient]]'' *Hana Isuzu, a character in the manga and anime series ''[[Girls und Panzer]]'' *Jung Hana, a character in the Korean drama ''[[Love Rain]]'' ==See also== *[[Hana (disambiguation)]] {{given name}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hana (Given Name)}} [[Category:Arabic feminine given names]] [[Category:Japanese feminine given names]] [[Category:Jewish feminine given names]] [[Category:Persian feminine given names]] [[Category:Slavic feminine given names]] [[Category:Albanian feminine given names]] [[Category:Korean feminine given names]]
